input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Customer Support Team,

I am reaching out to report a problem with the battery of my Lenovo IdeaPad 5 laptop. The battery discharges very quickly even with standard usage. The device remains under warranty You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. I would appreciate your help with this matter at your earliest opportunity.

Thank you.

Best regards,
<name>
Account Number: <acc_num>
Phone: <tel_num> My name is Carlos Mendoza.
